sensory_systems.name: Advanced LiDAR Systems

sensory_systems.name: Hyperspectral Imaging Cameras
sensory_systems.description: Cameras capturing data across a wide range of the electromagnetic spectrum (UV, visible, infrared) to analyze material composition and spectral signatures, enabling precise identification of objects and anomalies.

sensory_systems.name: Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems (MEMS) Accelerometers & Gyroscopes
sensory_systems.description: High-precision MEMS sensors for inertial measurement units (IMUs) providing accurate orientation and motion data for relative positioning and stability monitoring.

sensory_systems.name: Thermal Imaging Cameras (High Resolution)
sensory_systems.description: Arrays of thermal cameras with 16x16 or higher resolution for non-contact temperature measurement and anomaly detection.

control_systems.name: Adaptive Control Algorithms (Reinforcement Learning)

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) with Real-Time Simulation
control_systems.description: MPC algorithms integrated with high-fidelity real-time simulation models of the edge computing environment, allowing for proactive control and predictive maintenance.

control_systems.name: Digital Twin Control
control_systems.description: Real-time synchronization and closed-loop control between the physical edge computing infrastructure and a digital twin, facilitating remote monitoring, diagnostics, and optimization.

mechanical_systems.name: Modular Robotic Arms (Dexterous)

mechanical_systems.name: Precision Positioning Systems (Piezoelectric Actuators)
mechanical_systems.description: High-resolution, low-power actuators for precise movement of components within the edge computing hardware.

mechanical_systems.name: Self-Assembling Micro-Robotics
mechanical_systems.description: Autonomous systems of micro-robots capable of assembling and reconfiguring basic edge computing units.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integration.description: A comprehensive platform integrating sensor data, simulation models, control algorithms, and visualization tools for a holistic view of the edge computing environment.

software_integration.name: Federated Learning Frameworks
software_integration.description: Platforms enabling distributed model training across multiple edge devices without centralized data storage.

software_integration.name: Autonomous Orchestration Engine
software_integration.description: AI-driven system automating resource allocation, task scheduling, and fault management within the edge computing environment.
